title: La La Anthony Interview
itunes:title: La La Anthony Interview
description:
Today on the show we had friend to the room La La Anthony stop by where she spoke about Power, not letting her child watch the show, Carmelo being blackballed, new projects and more. Also, we had Sex Trafficking activist Toni Rivera stop by where she informed us on how common it is all over the country, ways to avoid it, and her experience with it. Moreover, Charlamagne gave a proud hee- haw to Dallas officer Aaron Dean for shooting Atatiana Jefferson in her home.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
